settings.title: Meet our Portland crew
settings.text: Whether it's running, dancing, yoga, pilates, boxing, or trampolining - we all love moving, and believe that movement heals your soul. We are a dynamic crew of likeminded folks who care about the wellness of others in our community. We love partnering with other locals for events and collaborations, and are always open to new ideas. We focus on bringing people together in our space where everybody is always welcome.

settings.custom_html: Watch: Choose Better, Choose Ellana
ELLANA PROMISE

settings.title: Our Principles
settings.text:
Make it better.

Make it with less.

Make it last.

Make it easy to use.

Make it multi.

Make it kind to all.

settings.title: Meet Theresa
settings.text:
Theresa is the founder and formulator of Ellana Cosmetics. She began Ellana in 2007 to help people have better skin using better ingredients that:

- Put your skin first.

- Make you feel good.

- Get your glow on.

settings.subtitle: Subheading
settings.contact_content:
Our goal is your complete satisfaction. In the unlikely event that our products fall short of your expectations, reach out and let us know. You may take advantage of our Shop Risk-Free 30-Day Guarantee where we work with you until we can come to an agreeable arrangement.

All we ask is that you purchase the products our Online Beauty Consultants recommend and try the products for at least 14 days to allow time for your skin to adjust and see early results. This time is needed to see effects, especially if your skin has been compromised due to using inferior or incorrect products. Everyone‚Äôs skin is different and whilst we have designed Ellana formulas with each skin type in mind, individual results and experiences may vary.

See our full Returns, Refunds and Exchange Policy here.

settings.title: Makeup
settings.subtitle: Ellana offers mineral makeup that puts skin health first. Our skin-first, multipurpose face base and color products provide multiple benefits, each made to fit your skin's unique needs. They act as ‚Äúdaytime skin care," with ingredients that enhance health and radiance over time.

settings.title: SHOP RISK FREE 30 DAY GUARANTEE
settings.content:
In the unlikely event that our products fall short of your expectations, reach out to us and let us know.

You may take advantage of our Shop Risk Free 30-Day Guarantee where we work with you until we can come up with an agreeable arrangement.

All we ask is that you purchase the products our Online Beauty Consultants recommend and try the products for at least fourteen (14) days to allow time for your skin to adjust and see early results. Time is needed to see effects especially if your skin has been compromised due to inferior or incorrect products.

Everyone's skin is different and while we designed Ellana formulas with each skin type and skin need in mind, individuals results and experience may vary.

#ChooseBetter gifts this season. Schedule your call now!

settings.column1_content: Ellana Foundations are formulated to be intensely pigmented, lightweight, water-resistant and with buildable coverage.
settings.column2_content: Concentrated skin-nourishing minerals and active ingredients make skin better: controlling sebum, drying acne, and smoothing textured skin.
settings.column3_content: Made with Mineral SkinShield¬Æ technology to protect skin from the sun. All Ellana products are SPF tested.

settings.title: THE BESTSELLING ELLANA LOOSE MINERAL FOUNDATION
settings.text:
The one that started it all, Ellana Cosmetics' first product is this 10-shade range of Loose Mineral Foundation.

Formulated specifically for normal-oily skin, this talc-free and filler-free powder formulation is made from kaolin clay to absorb excess oil, sericite and mica for a radiant look and the sun protecting skin calming minerals Zinc Oxide and Titanium Dioxide.

It's also water-resistant, making it perfect (and long wearing) in high humidity.

settings.custom_html: FORMULATED PURE. ZERO FILLERS.
WHAT OUR CUSTOMERS SAY

settings.title: CALM DOWN AHA/BHA ACNE SPOT GEL
settings.text:
This powerful spot treatment gently fights pimples, redness, and blemishes thanks to a cocktail of plant-derived AHAs and BHAs. It is formulated with skin protecting and hydrating ingredients so skin can recover better faster.

Oil-free and fungal-acne friendly.

settings.custom_html: BETTER INGREDIENTS FOR YOUR SKIN

ACHIEVE YOUR #SKINGOALS

Choosing which skincare products work for your skin type, condition and need can be overwhelming. We're here to help.
Book a 30-Min Design Your #SkinGoals Routine with our Online Beauty Consultant and determine the best ingredients and products for your skin.

settings.column1_title: FREE FROM HAIR & SCALP DRYING INGREDIENTS
settings.column1_content: No soaps, sulfates, silicones, or any ingredients that strip hair and scalp of natural oils.
settings.column2_content: Balanced to scalp's natural pH to keep hair roots clean and healthy.
settings.column3_content: Free from buildup-causing ingredients; potent actives penetrate easily addressing hair and scalp needs.

settings.one-col-column1_content: Formulated with only Curly Girl Method approved ingredients.

settings.custom_html: The Ellana Promise

settings.title: ADDRESS #HAIRCHALLENGES
settings.text:
CO-WASH: CLEANSE & CONDITION IN 1

The Refresh Co-wash hair bar gently cleans and conditions your hair and scalp

CONDITIONER: SMOOTH, SOFT & SILKY

Our Relax conditioner bar hydrates and protects hair reduces hair friction and preventing damage

SHAMPOO: BETTER CLEANSING

Targetted to help achieve your hair goals: be dandruff free, reduce hair fall, strengthen hair, clear up build up.

CONDITIONER: SMOOTH, SOFT & SILKY

Our Relax conditioner bar hydrates and protects hair reduces hair friction and preventing damage

settings.title: BABY FOAM IS BETTER
settings.text:
For healthy hair, choose sulfate-free shampoo and embrace Baby Foam.

Sulfates are common in conventional shampoo and are responsible for lather and foam. While it may feel luxurious and effective, sulfates are strong surfactants that clean but also dry out scalp and hair, dissolving natural oils leading to more damage than hair health.

Our Hair Bars have Baby Foam thanks to non-stripping plant-based surfactants derived from coconuts.

settings.content:

settings.title: BOOK A FREE SKIN ANALYSIS CONSULTATION
settings.content:
Everything your skin needs is just a call away.

We know how important it is to get the right kind of care.

No fuss, no BS. Just formulas that work perfectly, just the way you need them to.

We also know that shopping online can be tricky. There are questions that can‚Äôt be answered by a website alone ‚Äî what if you need to know more?

This is where our expert Beauty Consultants come in.
